<noinclude>本 Widget 用于支持 {{tl|TimeSinceLastEdit}} 的功能。非一般情况下请勿使用。

为了提高加载体验，本 Widget 内容经过压缩。原版内容（含注释）可在 [[Widget:TimeSinceLastEdit/Raw]] 取得。</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgTimeSinceLastEdit) || !$wgTimeSinceLastEdit}--><!--{assign var="wgTimeSinceLastEdit" value=true scope="global"}--><script>window.RLQ=window.RLQ||[];window.RLQ.push(function(){mw.loader.implement("widgetTimeSinceLastEdit",function($){mw.loader.using("moment").then(function(){function tsRefreshDuration(){$(".lastEditTime").each(function(){var lastEditTime,editTimeDiff,localizedTimeString;if(this.dataset&&this.dataset.lastEditTime&&(lastEditTime=moment.unix(this.dataset.lastEditTime-28800),lastEditTime&&lastEditTime.isValid())){if(editTimeDiff=moment.duration(moment().diff(lastEditTime)),!editTimeDiff||editTimeDiff.asMilliseconds()<0){$(this).text("未知时长（请校准您的设备时间再试）");return}localizedTimeString=editTimeDiff.humanize();$(this).text(localizedTimeString)}})}window.setInterval(function(){tsRefreshDuration()},16e3);tsRefreshDuration()})})});
